Load in dataset and view summary statistics
```{r}
library(ggplot2)

total_data <- read.csv("C:/Users/proll/OneDrive/Documents/ML/Airline_Delay_Cause.csv", 
                       header=T, stringsAsFactors=T)

summary(total_data)

```
Remove NAs
```{r}
total_data <- na.omit(total_data)
```

New Data
```{r}
summary(total_data)
```


Which Month has the largest median number of baggage complaints?
```{r}
boxplot(total_data$carrier_delay~total_data$carrier_name)
```
Which Airline has the largest median number of baggage complaints?
```{r}
unique(total_data$carrier_name)


```
